posts.name: Harry Sanabria
posts.cooked:
Today, we‚Äôre releasing version 7.59 to beta. If you‚Äôre interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • This update improves the layout of media messages with quoted replies, and also fixes a visual gap that appeared between the search bar and your chat list when the ‚ÄúReduce Transparency‚Äù iOS Accessibility setting was enabled.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.58 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.59.0.776-beta

46 new commits since 7.58.0.770-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.59 [1]

  • Add ChooseBackupPlanView [2]

  • Make SVR backup after AEP migration more durable [3]

  • Don't initialize backup attachment download progress outside the main app [4]

  • Throw a more consistent error from MBKeyMaterial.backupKey() [5]

  • Design tweaks to Backup Settings [6]

  • Add presentAndPropagateResult to ModalActivityIndicator [7]

  • Asyncify generateThumbnailsAsync [8]

  • Asyncify leaveGroupOrDeclineInviteAsyncWithUI [9]

  • Asyncify username methods [10]

  • Remove behavior404 that doesn‚Äôt do anything [11]

  • Adjust cases for contact permission reminder [12]

  • Fix message processing performance measurement [13]

  • Add internal debugging for errors joining groups [14]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.71.0 [15]

  • Add cancellation support to the NSE [16]

  • Allow 27 seconds for background refreshes [17]

  • Try up to 6 times when fetching in the NSE [18]

  • Log 'last launched'/'first launched' version info on launch before updating [19]

  • Skip archiving session switchover info messages in note to self [20]

  • Fix layout when presenting conversation settings with keyboard open [21]

  • Improve pre key culling logic [22]

  • Simplify view models in BackupSettingsViewController [23]

  • Only attempt to redeem a Backups subscription on registered primaries [24]

  • Some fixes to Backup subscription redemption [25]

  • Add LineWrappingStackView [26]

  • Revert changes to Chat List extended layout [27]

  • Allow backing out of Quick Restore [28]

  • Allow backing out of phone number entry during registration [29]

  • Allow saving photos when permissions are write-only [30]

  • Remove mocks for pre keys stores [31]

  • setUpLocalIdentifiers should check for deregistered instances [32]

  • Avoid double presenting during provisioning flow [33]

  • Add BackupIdManager [34]

  • Add chat list banner for backup attachment download progress [35]

  • Add additional reglock tests, fix a registration edge case. [36]

  • Tweak parameter for internal users [37]

  • Adjust group refresh timeout behavior [38]

  • De-protocolize RecipientDatabaseTable [39]

  • Mark Hello World as unnecessary when reregistering [40]

  • Generalize BackupAttachmentDownloadQueueStatus to cover upload queue status [41]

  • Partially revert "When writing a debug log, repeat logs about the local app state" [42]

  • List media regardless of backup attachment download queue status [43]

  • Mark autoLoadMoreIfNecessary with @discardableResult. [‚Ä¶] [44]

  • Split up the SVR restore & backup calls during registration [45]

  • Update translations [46]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.58.0.770-beta‚Ä¶7.59.0.776-beta

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Failed to select attachment. I still cannot send multiple pictures from signal when using the picker :(

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.59.0/1b8eba727ff971d74cdddf589c1c8833106c5304e4ff4d7b3ab03281907c5cd1.zip

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Looks like an issue where Signal isn‚Äôt able to load ‚ÄúAdobe raw‚Äù image files, unrelated to the new picker. (Possibly these didn‚Äôt show as options for sending in the old picker?) Thanks for reporting ‚Äì we‚Äôll take a look!

sashaweiss-signal:

Looks like an issue where Signal isn‚Äôt able to load ‚ÄúAdobe raw‚Äù image files

For reference:

Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.58 release iOS Beta Feedback
Looks like there was an image format in there that we don‚Äôt handle: 2025/05/09 18:18:22:554 WRNüß° [SendMediaNavigationController.swift:538 showApprovalAfterProcessingAnyMediaLibrarySelections(picker:)]: failed to prepare attachments. error: Error Domain=NSItemProviderErrorDomain Code=-1000 ‚ÄúCannot load representation of type com.adobe.raw-image‚Äù UserInfo={NSLocalizedDescription=Cannot load representation of type com.adobe.raw-image, NSUnderlyingError=0x11a6f8000 {Error Domain=NSItemProviderErr‚Ä¶

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.60 release.
